title: Russia has attacked Lviv. Here's why the western city is so important to Ukraine's defense - CNN
content:
1. Russia has attacked Lviv. Here's why the western city is so important to Ukraine's defense  CNN
  2. War in Ukraine live updates: Russia expands airstrikes, hitting the western Ukrainian city of Lviv  NPR
  3. U.S. seeks China's help to end Russia's war in Ukraine  Reuters
  4. New video: CNN reports from the ground after attack in Lviv  CNN
  5. UN says Ukraine food supply 'falling apart'; Biden to push Xi to abandon Moscow  Yahoo News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: Russia launched missile strikes near an airport in Lviv on Friday, a strategic Ukrainian city not far from the Polish border that had until now largely been spared from the relentless bombardment witnessed across much of the country during the war.
